title: This MCP Server for AI Coding Assistants Will 10x Your Productivity
description:
There is no denying that AI coding assistants like Cursor and Windsurf are extremely powerful, but their biggest limitation right now is they hallucinate a LOT when working with specific tools and frameworks.

We need a way to easily provide documentation for our favorite frameworks and tools to the AI coding assistant in a way it can truly understand, and I have found a tool (an MCP server) that does exactly this - Context7!

In this video, I'll show you how you can get up and running with Context7 in minutes (for free) in any AI coding assistant to level up your AI coding game.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Check out Scrimba if you're serious about mastering full stack development. AI coding assistants are a powerful way to get you started, but it's more crucial then ever to have a solid foundation for frontend and backend development!

https://scrimba.com/?via=colemedin

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Context7:

https://context7.com/

Context7 MCP Server:

https://github.com/upstash/context7-mcp

My video covering my full AI coding process:

https://youtu.be/SS5DYx6mPw8

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

00:00 - Introducing Context7
00:50 - Overview of Context7
01:30 - The Power of Context7
03:19 - Why Context7 is Better than Cursor Custom Docs
03:46 - Context7 MCP Server
05:17 - Understanding the Tools for the MCP Server
06:54 - My Setup for Coding with Context7 + Windsurf
08:24 - Scrimba
10:12 - Coding an AI Agent with Context7
12:20 - Demo of Our Agent
14:57 - Outro

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Join me as I push the limits of what is possible with AI. I'll be uploading videos at least two times a week - Sundays and Wednesdays at 7:00 PM CDT!
